page.description: The {TIMER} command generates timer events. The interval between events is specified by the {INTERVAL} command.

argument.name: Timer_Name
argument.description: Character. The name of the timer event.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim cnt as N cnt = 1 ui_modeless_dlg_box("{INTERVAL}",<<%dlg% {timer=increment} {interval=.05} {progress=50cnt} ; %dlg%,<<%code% if a_dlg_button = "increment" then cnt = cnt + 1 if cnt = 100 then cnt = 1 end if end if if a_dlg_button = "close" then ui_modeless_dlg_close("{INTERVAL}") end if %code%)

section.description: This example displays a message box for 5 seconds.
section.example: ui_dlg_box("Message",<<%dlg% {size=3}{timer=close}{interval=5} This message will display for 5 seconds... %dlg%)
